channel.title: Ands14es and big_n12
channel.description:
griefed a layer of mine and fuscate's mob grinder, removed some sandstone and water
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/M8prX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wWdKB.png[/img]
i fixed it myself, just reporting.

item.title: Ands14es and big_n12
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

maybe i didnt actually rep- him Tom. I just said I was going to.

idc anyways you people can’t derep me anymore!

asshole_rule wins in the end!

Read full topic

@Crusader1789 wrote:

and, by the way, that was a cool place you built. you should think of something cool to build in the 1.3.1 world too!

Read full topic

item.title: Ands14es and big_n12
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Is this sorted then, it doesn’t seem like much damage? The offender has said sorry so I believe no punishment should be given.

I’d also like to say that rep abuse is an offense, and one member of this topic has had their rep locked due to it. If possible, one day, if a correct system hasn’t been implemented I’d like to separate of the reputation system and I’ll tell you now any form of abuse won’t be acceptable and it will be monitored.

So best not make a habit of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Ands14es and big_n12
item.dc:creator: @Crusader1789 Crusader1789
item.description:
@Crusader1789 wrote:

oh well then i accidently griefed YOUR place! sorry for that by the way. you had all the right to be mad.

Read full topic

item.title: Ands14es and big_n12
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Crusader1789:

hey i accidently griefed meepj before. it was because i didnt know it was his house and i didnt know how to get in. so i broke through the wall. i got overpowered by my own human curiosity. but as “curiosity killed the cat”, meepj and his buddy almost did kill me. we eventually forgave each other though. so everything is fine. and everybody is going to grief sooner or later, its just a matter of time. i think we all should get our chances. i still am sorry for griefing his house. i didnt mean it. but i got my chance and so big_n12 and andes14es should get a chance too. and you would do that too if you were trapped in there. it was the only way out.

That’s my place you griefed, MeepJ is the guarddog.

Read full topic

item.title: Ands14es and big_n12
item.dc:creator: @big_n12 big_n12
item.description:
@big_n12 wrote:

I’ sorry I didn’t mean that as a grief i got trapped up there and didn’t know how to get down and so i dug down hoping to explain it later and found the water so i bucketed it and got down. I really am sorry
